[[File:GoT Season 2 back cover.jpg|right|250px|thumb|The Season 2 soundtrack back cover and tracklisting.]]
The '''Game of Thrones Season 2 Soundtrack''' was composed by [[Ramin Djawadi]] and was released on June 19, 2012. It was preceded by the ''[[Game of Thrones Season 1 Soundtrack]]'', released in 2011, and followed by the ''[[Game of Thrones Season 3 Soundtrack]]'', released in 2013.
sections.Trivia: Track 20, "The Rains of Castamere" is misspelled as "The Rains of Castomere" on the back cover.
